originalText.text:
Jobs Plus I must say they paid for me to attend a university that not only had a police officer do the training for security officer but the officer made Time after class if there were any questions.  The training cost was $3000. I received my Liscense & the officer also, gelped anyone who needed guidance in getting a job . Thank you Jobs Plus & all the staff. You guys Mr Damian & Anthony have made a difference in Community.  Thank u Sincerely all the Directors who also made available time for me.
Luv u Jobs Plus

originalText.text: I recently moved to the Lower East Side and signed up for jobs plus. The intake went really smooth. After I was assigned a job coordinator Krystal and I‚Äôve had such a horrible experience. I voiced my opinion over four time to the receptionist who took my name so I can speak with the director Raven. I emailed Raven  still no response. It makes alot of sense why the job coordinator didn‚Äôt take helping me more serious. Management is not checking in with client yo make sure they feel supported and heard. It start with the Director! üïäÔ∏è

originalText.text: I have been a jobs plus member since 2014 and till this day whenever I need help they help but remember you gotta help yourselves so others can help you come in positive and willing to learn or work I'm telling you from experience you will get things out from the program...

originalText.text: Raven a worker was very disrespectful to my family. And had a very bad attitude and was very disrespectful by saying that she was immature and could not get in even though they lived with me. So I would not recommend her as a counselor since she does not know how to deal with customers. So I think she should get fired.

originalText.text: It's supposed to be a center to help the tenants in Lillian wald but at the same time I understand that technology is getting stronger but when this year it came to have to scan a barcode in order to get a free turkey it was detremental to the seniors because most of them don't know how to do it, I also went there and tried to fill out taxes and the person who took care of me just printed out the tax application and sent me on my way, still have not received my taxes, I also tried reaching the program director since December 2022 and she's never available, the secretary always says she is not available, how convenient!!!!!
